attributes.action: Law for the Protection of honour & Dignity of Holy Prophets
attributes.additional_details:
Some peoples had misused freedom of speech act and have created such an offensive literature which has created so much hatred and negativity in our communities, which is not good for our public & Country. We need to be bit more sensitive and understanding about the Muslim sentiments about the beloved prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him).
 We ask for the respect & consideration of large Muslim sentiment  about Prophet Muhammad (pbuh) & Other holy Prophets.
We demand from great British peoples and parliament to discuss this matter for  “Making New laws for the protection of honor & dignity of all the holy prophets of all the great religions of the world.”
 And parliament  should devise a mechanism to put a stop for the misuse of freedom of speech act and those who are behind such conspiracies and hatred literature in any form should be brought to justice and appropriate actions should be taken against these culprits.
